text: Pavel Lůžek (born 3 April 1964) is a Czech rower. He competed in the men's quadruple sculls event at the 1988 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1964 births Category:Living people Category:Czech male rowers Category:Olympic rowers of Czechoslovakia Category:Rowers at the 1988 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Ústí nad Labem
title: Pavel Lůžek
